name: Rabbit Dungeon Shooter
description:
A small dungeon shooter inspired by The Binding Of Isaac.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Arrow key to shoot. You can also shoot diagonally.

Source code for the game is available here:

https://github.com/chipset1/rabbit-dungeon-shooter/

Sprites from:

https://opengameart.org/content/32x32-fantasy-tileset CC-BY-SA 3.0
